info.name: DGCIP POC
info.description: API for accessing Dollar General analytics

response.name: success response
response.body: [{"fact":"sales","fact_label":"Sales","metric":"sales","label":"Sales $","format":"MasterCard","report_guide":"Total dollar sales of the selected product over the date range and across all selected stores. This is net of promotional discounts but does not reflect manufacturer coupons or rebates."}]
